achievements.name: EASY
achievements.description: Win your first game of Survival Games.

achievements.name: FOCUSED
achievements.description: Don't punch, crouch, or jump whilst waiting for the game to start.

achievements.name: REAL_FIGHTER
achievements.description: Win 10 games whilst never even holding a fishing rod in your inventory.

achievements.name: STONE_AGE
achievements.description: Get to DeathMatch whilst never using an Iron or Diamond Sword.

achievements.name: NO_ROD
achievements.description: Win a game whilst never even holding a fishing rod in your inventory.

achievements.name: WORKING_FOR_IT
achievements.description: Get to DeathMatch whilst also having at least 5 kills.
